start_message: Welcome to ChatBotChef EU! Let's cook something amazing together.

menu.start.welcome:

Modes: Recipes ¬∑ Calorie calculator ¬∑ Ingredient macros ¬∑ Help
recipes.prompt.next: Write the ingredients you have, for example: ‚Äútomatoes, pasta, basil‚Äù.
calorie.prompt.next: Share your height, weight, age, sex, activity level, and goal so I can calculate your plan.
macros.prompt.next: Tell me an ingredient and amount, for example: ‚Äúchicken breast 100 g‚Äù.
help.text:
Here‚Äôs what I can do:
‚Ä¢ Recipes ‚Äì get quick meal ideas from your ingredients.
‚Ä¢ Calorie calculator ‚Äì estimate daily calories and macros.
‚Ä¢ Ingredient macros ‚Äì check nutrition for a specific product.
Use /start anytime to open the menu again.
menu.language.title: Choose your language
lang.other.title: Other languages
lang.other.prompt: Type a greeting (e.g., “Hello/Bonjour/Hola/Ciao/Hallo”) in your language. I’ll detect it and switch.
lang.other.unknown: I couldn't detect the language. Please try another common greeting.
lang.other.unsupported: This language isn't supported yet. I'll keep English for now. You can suggest adding it!
only_text: I only accept text messages so I can understand your cravings.
premium_status_active: Your Premium plan is active until {date}.
premium_status_inactive: Premium is not active yet. Upgrade to keep cooking without limits!
not_authorized: You are not authorized to run this command.
limit_reached: You have reached the free limit of {limit} messages. Premium for {duration} days is available for ‚Ç¨{price}.
calorie_prefix: Here is the calorie and macro breakdown:
recipe_prefix: Here is a friendly recipe suggestion:
ai_error: I could not get inspiration right now. Please try again soon.
system_prompt: You are ChatBotChef, a culinary assistant for healthy and tasty European recipes. Provide concise answers.
premium_reminder: Your Premium plan expires on {date}. Renew to continue unlimited cooking magic!
